Welcome To Chernobyl tour

Organise Your Own Tour

Author's tour to the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone with a professional guide

Find Consultant Read More
Plan a journey

You can take a day trip or a multi day trip to Chernobyl from Kyiv. You can even spend the night there. Chernobyl is safe to visit, as long as you follow the rules.Book your Chernobyl tour in advance. Preferably 2 weeks.

Financial Planning

We have a calculator, which can help you to calculate prices of a tour. Just try!

English speakers

All our guiders speak English and some of them can speak Polish.

23+
Years Experience
Know Our Company

Our Company Provide High Quality Tours

The accident at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant took place more than 30 years ago. Until now, mankind feels the effects of the global catastrophe. Our company offers exclusive tours to the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone for citizens of Ukraine and other countries. We organize trips completely legally, we have all the necessary licenses and permits. We invite you to visit the place where the great tragedy took place on April 26, 1986.

Percent of satisfied
95%

The residents of the Exclusion Zone

Those who came back to their houses after the evacuation in 1986 are called self-settlers.

What is known about the medical and sanitary part of the city of Pripyat?

The five-floor hospital, which is located in the abandoned city of Pripyat, even by today's standards, is considered a fairly large structure.

24 Sept 2022
How has the radiation level in Chernobyl changed since the accident?

Chernobyl is a place where you can see the consequences of human carelessness. Nuclear reactor explosion in April 1986 divided human life into before and after.

Get updated Informed to Subscribe our Newsletter

Subscribe Now

A tour designed for a small group of tourists in the format "The disaster of the USSR on April 26, 1986 in one day". During the trip you will get many unforgettable emotions and impressions, you will visit the site of one of the most terrible man-made disasters. Our guides will show and tell you the history of important places, where a large amount of technology is still preserved. You will see nature gradually conquering the ghost town of Pripyat.

Resent Post

Starting from February 19 the Chernobyl zone is closed for tourist visits for an indefinite period. The official explanation is "due to the technical reasons''.
February 19, 2022
